r.d:
This is an extension to efficiently schedule I/O, time and signal based events using the best I/O notification mechanism available for specific platform. This is a port of libevent to the PHP infrastructure.
Version 1.0.0 introduces: * new OO API breaking backwards compatibility * support of libevent 2+ including HTTP, DNS, OpenSSL and the event listener.
Note, event-1.0.0 and greater is not compatible with previous versions.
r.n: Fix: with OpenSSL turned off got error: undefined symbol: zim_EventUtil_sslRandPoll Add: implemented get_properties property handler(is called when one casts an object to array) Refact: removed memory alloc for empty property hashtables Fix: heap corruption caused by EventBufferEvent callbacks(thanks to Marco Schuster) Fix: continuous calls to EventBufferEvent::setCallbacks didn't free old fci/fcc(thanks to Marco Schuster) Fix: possible heap corruption in EventListener's callback Add: EventBase::resume method
